actions.name: Add or Update an Account
actions.description: Creates a new Account or updates an existing Account

params.name: Check for duplicates using
params.description: Select the account property to be used to check for duplicates. We recommend this to be the name

params.name: Value to check for
params.description: Enter the value (of property selected above) to look for duplicates

params.name: Update existing data?
params.description: Select 'Yes' if this Action's input data should override Salesforce field data (if present).

params.name: Account Owner

responseFields.name: Account Id
responseFields.description: Id of the newly added / updated Account

actions.name: Add a Call Log

params.name: Assigned to

responseFields.name: Call Log Id
responseFields.description: Id of the newly added Call Log

actions.name: Add a Campaign Member
actions.description: Creates a new Campaign Member (Existing Lead or Contact)

params.name: Campaign
Contact Id
params.description: Adds this Contact to above selected Campaign

params.name: Lead Id
params.description: Adds this Lead to above selected Campaign

responseFields.name: Campaign Member Id
responseFields.description: Id of the newly added Campaign Member

actions.name: Add or Update a Case
actions.description: Creates a new Case or updates an existing Case

params.name: Check for duplicates using
params.description: Select the Event property to be used to check for duplicates. We recommend this to be the subject

params.name: Value to check for
params.description: Value for the above matching field

params.name: Update existing data?
params.description: Select 'Yes' if this Action's input data should override Salesforce field data (if present).

params.name: Case Owner
Contact
params.description: Links the Case to this Contact

params.name: Account
params.description: Links the Case to this Account

params.name: Asset
params.description: Links the Case to this Asset

params.name: Parent Case
params.description: Links the Case to this Case

responseFields.name: Case Id
responseFields.description: Id of the newly added Case

actions.name: Add or Update a Contact
actions.description: Creates a new Contact or updates an existing Contact

params.name: Check for duplicates using
params.description: Select the contact property to be used to check for duplicates. We recommend this to be the email address

params.name: Value to check for
params.description: Enter the value (of property selected above) to look for duplicates

params.name: Update existing data?
params.description: Select 'Yes' if this Action's input data should override Salesforce field data (if present).

params.name: Salutation
Contact Owner
Reports To
Account
params.description: Links the contact to this account

params.name: Lead Source

responseFields.name: Contact Id
responseFields.description: Id of the newly added Contact

actions.name: Add or Update a Custom Object
actions.description: Creates a new Custom Object or updates an existing Custom Object

params.name: Custom Object Type
params.description: Select the Custom object type to create or update.

params.name: Update if existing
params.description: May not work as expected for few Objects due to respective field level permissions.

params.name: Check for duplicates using
params.description: Select the account property to be used to check for duplicates.

params.name: Value to check for
params.description: Enter the value (of property selected above) to look for duplicates

params.name: Update existing data?
params.description: Select 'Yes' if this Action's input data should override Salesforce field data (if present).

params.name: Object Owner

responseFields.name: Custom Object Id
responseFields.description: Id of the newly added/updated Custom Object

actions.name: Add or Update an Event
actions.description: Creates a new Event or updates an existing Event

params.name: Check for duplicates using
params.description: Select the Event property to be used to check for duplicates. We recommend this to be the subject

params.name: Value to check for
params.description: Value for the above matching field

params.name: Update existing data?
params.description: Select 'Yes' if this Action's input data should override Salesforce field data (if present).

params.name: Assigned to
Due Date
params.description: Due Date is required if 'All-Day Event' is 'Yes'

responseFields.name: Event Id
responseFields.description: Id of the newly added Event

actions.name: Add a Note

actions.name: Get Account of a Contact

responseFields.name: Account Found
responseFields.description: Yes, if an Account is found

responseFields.name: Account Master Record Id
responseFields.description: If this object was deleted as the result of a merge, this field contains the ID of the record that was kept. If this object was deleted for any other reason, or has not been deleted, the value is null.

actions.name: Get Opportunities of a Contact

responseFields.name: Opportunity Found
responseFields.description: Yes if an Opportunity is found

responseFields.name: Other Opportunity Ids
responseFields.description: If there are more than one opportunity for the given Contact, csv of those id's

actions.name: Get Contacts for a Opportunity

responseFields.name: Contact Found
responseFields.description: Yes if a Contact is found

responseFields.name: Master Record Id
responseFields.description: If this record was deleted as the result of a merge, this field contains the ID of the record that remains. If this record was deleted for any other reason, or has not been deleted, the value is null.

description: Salesforce is a leading cloud sales platform with diverse CRM functionality on multiple devices and robust app marketplace.

params.description: To track on a Property, please make sure Account Field History is enabled for Property (In your Salesforce org go to Setup -> Object Manager -> Account -> Fields & Relationships -> Set History Tracking -> Enable -> Select fields).

responseFields.description: If this object was deleted as the result of a merge, this field contains the ID of the record that was kept. If this object was deleted for any other reason, or has not been deleted, the value is null.
